website_summaries.verdict: Slim size that are bright and friendly for children, as well as non-toxic and BPA-free. Great value considering you get four in a package.
pros: Comes in over six designs so it’s easy to find a favorite character for your child
Food remains cold for around six hours in an insulated lunch box
Keeps food cold without freezing, which is especially important for growing children with sensitive teeth
cons: Mild sweating and are somewhat too large, especially if you want to use more than one in smaller lunch boxes

customer_reviews.title: Cold and Effective but lbr They Adorbs
customer_reviews.text: a) adorable b) effective c) compact d) ADORABLE Penguins. Freezy penguins. I am a grown-ass man, and these are the best thing to whip out of your lunchbox at work and be like, yes, this is a tiny cold orange penguin.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They're so cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They're so cute. I bought 2 4-packs and use them to help keep my guinea pigs cool during the summer months (I wrap them in a layer of cloth so they can stand/lie down on the packs if they get too warm). They're filled with water only and not that gel, so if for some reason my pigs do get under the fabric and chew on the pack, the contents inside won't harm them. One pack only lasts 2-3 hours before the ice has melted, and about 5 hours until it's fully warm, but when I put two packs together it lasts a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Great little icepacks!
customer_reviews.text: These icepacks are perfect for our 4YO's lunchbox! We originally had a square ice pack from Walmart in her lunchbox, but our 4YO kept complaining that it made her backpack heavy. So, we opted out for these. Although we were concerned about the longevity of the coolness because of the size, we bought these anyways because of the size and weight. However, these ended up surprising us with how long they stay cool! It keeps our 4YO's lunchbox cool until she gets home when I take them out to put back in the freezer (9AM-230PM)! Cute shape, great durability, keeps things cool, and lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute lunchbox ice packs
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and fun for a lunch box. The don't stay super cold that long but I don't keep things frozen in there so it's ok. I like that they are water filled as well. The only negative is that the plastic is a little thin. I've never had one break and my toddler did decide to teeth on one of them... and that poor penguin now has a mangled flipper where she chewed.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great for snacks
customer_reviews.text: These are durable and wonderful for little kids! They tend to stay cold for about 3-5 hours depending on the outside conditions (sitting in sun, warm room, etc). We use them for our daughters snack lunch box (kindergarten thing) and they are perfect! Love that they are fairly lightweight so they don’t make her backpack heavier. Also super easy to clean when something spills in her lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Penguins for the win
customer_reviews.text: I only use it as an ice pack. The classic strange cold fluid inside ice packs that nobody knows what it is. I wouldnt personally heat it. But the design is cute as hell. And they stay cold for about 20-30 minutes as an ice pack and longer in a cooler. Size isnt bad. Fits in lunchboxes
customer_reviews.author: Jey!

customer_reviews.title: They work for us
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these ice packs for several months and they keep our daughters lunch cold for about 4 hours. We use two of them in her lunch box. They are fully thawed by the time she gets home from school which is fine since lunch is in the middle of the day and not after school. Good product and I would purchase again 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Just trying to help 😁

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: My kids somehow loose coolers at a huge rate. I bought a few expensive ones in Whole Foods that don't drip etc. but it just makes me more annoyed when they get lost. These are small and cute and I haven't seen them drip on food. They are perfect size for small lunch boxes and feel really sturdy so I'm not worried about my 2 year old breaking them. The kids love them also which is an added bonus. I'm sure I'll be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay cold long at all
customer_reviews.text: These freezer packs essentially just have water in them. They take more than a day to refreeze solid, and they thaw very quickly. If you have minimal space in a bag for an ice pack, these are great, but because they are so small they are not very effective. My son uses one in his lunchbox daily for preschool, and even in a temp controlled classroom, it's thawed within 2 hours in his thermal lined lunchbox. It works for lunches, but something that needs to be cold all day, no way.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare lunches!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these. They are very cute! I use two of them in a skip hop lunch bag to pack my toddler’s lunch in. I like that they are slim so they don’t take up too much space. This is helpful if you’re right on freezer space as well as they nest nicely into each other. They are sealed well and don’t leak. They are also filled with water so no need to worry about leakage if they eventually do leak. The colours I received vary from what’s pictured, but that didn’t matter to me. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my daughter lunch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who just started kindergarten to use in her lunchbox. She loves the looks and colors of them, and I like how they are so flat that they fit nicely in her lunch box. She says her food is cold by the time she eats lunch and her water is still even cold when she gets home from school. I would recommend these ice packs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cool
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why there is a rating for warmth. These cute little penguins are a show stopper! They hold the cold extremely well. I have used them successfully for 7 hours and they remain and keep food cold. They go right in the dishwasher for easy cleaning. I love that they came in a four pack so I can split between my kids or throw an extra one in their box for items that need more cold. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good little ice packs.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé never puts enough ice packs in with her lunch to keep it safely cold. She absolutely adores anything with penguins, so I thought these would be perfect to get her bringing more ice in her lunch bag. They work wonderfully as she brings all of them every day. My only complaint is that they are a bit smaller than I hoped. This does mean they freeze up a bit faster, so I would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: kstone

customer_reviews.title: I love these guys
customer_reviews.text: I carry these in my lunch pail because lately our work refrigerator has been overwhelmed with people's oversize grocery totes and lunch bags. They do a great job and very convenient. I pop three in my lunch bag, and by the end of the day the lunch bag is still cooler. I don't have to worry about rushing my food to the refrigerator, because these guys will keep them cool and protected. I usually use three or four, just in case but three has worked fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school lunches
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, easily labeled, and perfect for lunches. They last just long enough for elementary school lunch. And you can easily add mire than one for larger lunches. They are very thin and therefore easy to fit in lunch boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool for up to 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for 2 years and they keep my kids lunches cool for half the day. By the time they get home they are lukewarm but that’s to be expected when their lunch coolers are in the hot sun al day outside of their classroom. They don’t eat after 12pm anyways besides their other snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Elhami

customer_reviews.title: Cute cooler additions!
customer_reviews.text: Great little cooler additions. These are very thin and convenient ice packs. They aren’t bulky and do a good job at keeping things cold for a few hours. Because they are so compact, they work really well for lunch bags or smaller coolers. If you’re looking for an ice pack to use for a few hours, look no further than these cute little penguins. If you want something to stay frozen for 5+ hours, these aren’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Racheleray

customer_reviews.title: Keeps lunch cold
customer_reviews.text: These slim ice packs are great for school lunches. They stay cold through lunchtime with minimal sweating. My kid likes the colors and shape. I like that they are small enough to fit in a lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!! I packed my lunch about 8am and ate my lunch around 3pm, when I opened my bag I felt the cool air coming from the bag. My food was cold as if I pulled it out of the fridge. The penguin was still semi frozen. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PinCkButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I got a pack of the owls. They are colorful and fit into my child's lunchbox very well. They leave plenty of room for all of the food and drink while keeping everything cool. I like that they're lightweight and don't add bulk.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay frozen for long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my three granddaughters for their lunch bags to keep food cool. They are not thick enough to stay frozen for long, so come the warmer weather I will have to buy better ones. They are cute and colorful. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cracked after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Cute and worked pretty well but after 3 weeks one has already cracked, making it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Pszczolka M

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little small
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little ice packs. I like that they are flat and don't take up a lot of space. That being said, I do wish that they were a little bigger. My daughters have regular sized square lunch boxes and these cold packs only take up about half of it, so the things that get packed in the top don't particularly stay cool. I just pack the cold things in the bottom and the things that don't need to be cold on top and it seems to work fine. My girls do love having these and they love picking out the different colors in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Erica C.

customer_reviews.title: These are so COOL!
customer_reviews.text: I love these coolers! They are small enough to not be heavy in a kids lunch pail. Also they tuck nice into the door shelf of our freezer. They keep the kid's lunch cool but not frozen. Also perfect to throw a bunch in a cooler for the afternoon to the beach or park or pool.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but not super effective
customer_reviews.text: These little penguin ice packs are ridiculously cute, but they are so thin that they do not stay cold for very long. I would not trust them to keep a lunch safely cold by themselves. It is nice that they are thin, and I think that they can work well in conjunction with larger ice packs. I use larger ice packs in my children's lunches, then slip one or two of these thin penguins on top of the lunch to provide a little extra cold. They only time I have used them alone and not in conjunction with other ice packs was because I needed to send in a morning snack only for preschool.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for packing my kids school lunches. I just wipe them down when I unpack the lunch box after school and refreeze them for the next day. The kids love picking what color they want. I like that they are unique so someone else doesn’t accidentally grab it at school thinking it’s their own.
customer_reviews.author: KL Stein

customer_reviews.title: perfect for kids lunches
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for a kids lunch box. They aren't very thick which is great since they're light but they do a great job of keeping things cool in a kids lunch box that might have a ziploc bag or two of veggies, a sandwich, and juice box. My daughter also loves the penguin theme. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus I

customer_reviews.title: Half day not a full day
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for small lunch backs and dont take up much room. They will not stay frozen all day inside a lunch bag though but perfect to get you through until lunch time. My kids loved them and I do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H

customer_reviews.title: Well made and attractive
customer_reviews.text: My preschooler loves these! They work great to keep his lunch cold and are sturdy and easy to clean. He also likes to use them for boo-boos, and helps himself to an ice pack about a million times a day. The shape is so cute and we've been very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Ben and LarissaTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: Item as expected but it is very small
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars because the item is what the picture shows and its what I expected, however they are very small. Again I did expect them to be small but I found myself using all of them at once, or one of these and a bigger ice pack at the same time because I was worried they wouldn’t keep lunch items cold enough. I still plan to use them.
customer_reviews.author: ryan teeter

customer_reviews.title: Okay for limited amount of time
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for school lunch boxes. They have a very slim profile and take up little room in the freezer. However, because of their slim design and composition of frozen water, they do not stay as cold as many of the competitors cooler packs. They are fine for a few hours, but would not rely on these to keep food ice cold for more than 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel E. Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Slim, cute, great ice pack!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of these cute, durable little penguin shaped ice cooler packs. Each penguin is about five inches long and easily fits in both my children’s lunchboxes. It has a slim profile so it does not take up a great deal of room. I can slide it under sandwich boxes or put it on top of a lunchables.
customer_reviews.author: EastCobbMama

customer_reviews.title: Great for lunches, hold up great in the longterm!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these cute ice packs for my kids' lunches. They are a great size, perfect for a lunchbox. They are dishwasher safe, they hold up great (my first purchase was 2 years ago) and they freeze well and when the kids come home at the end of the day they are still cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute & functional
customer_reviews.text: love that these are perfect size for my kids lunch box. They are easy to clean and keep their lunches cool. I keep them in the freezer and add them to their lunches in the morning. By lunch time my kids have reported the lunch is still cool. I also like that you receive more than one and a variety of colors!
customer_reviews.author: Party Planner

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very practical
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and so useful! Love that there is four of them - even if I forget to put one back in the freezer, there is always three more in there! These are quite thin and fit into my son's lunch bag very nicely. Even after 4 hours in school they are still cold to the touch. My son loves the cute penguin shapes too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ad Valorem

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Got these just in time for school to start. I use them to keep my kids sandwiches fresh in their lunch bags till lunch time. They are larger than they appear, comparable to a piece of bread.
customer_reviews.author: jill2150

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school lunches!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter new food containers with dividers for her lunch box, so I could stop using so many plastic baggies. With the new container it was impossible to fit the standard ice packs. My options were to get her a whole new lunch box, or find new ice pack options. These were the perfect answer! They fit great below and above her food container and still allow for easy closing of the lunch box. They keep the food cold, wash well, and have been holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's a lunch box ice pack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughters lunches. What ya see is what ya get...a set of nice little ice packs that are perfect for school lunches. They're durable and keep things cold..just like they're supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality; Not Very Cold
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but the don’t keep food very cold (chikdren’s lunch sack). I’ve had to send two ice packs with each lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Buch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my purposes. I used these in the insulated pockets of my diaper bag to take milk through the airport security. One owl shape fit perfect and kept the milk cold. No problems. Would definitely purchase again! The fun colors and choices of shapes were an added bonus .
customer_reviews.author: ThoussaintTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Simply Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to find a cute new way to keep the kids lunches cool through the school day and this is it. They are adorable, great quality and keep the lunches cold the whole school day. Great Buy
customer_reviews.author: Omi & Tela

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: They work for the little ones lunches, they dont stay frozen long enough. I pack 2 sometimes. I even put lunch bag in freezer, especially in the warmer school days
customer_reviews.author: merchandiser

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine to keep my food cold in an insulated lunch box. Sadly I left them all in the freezer of an old apartment, but will be purchasing more. Love that they're slim enough not to waste valuable space
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: You want these!
customer_reviews.text: You want these for your kids lunch boxes! First of all they are so cute! My girls fight over which color to choose that day. They keep cold all school day and I personally love that they are SO thin! It's perfect and not bulky. Fits in any size lunch box/bag I've used. So glad I got these!
customer_reviews.author: MARY LEIMER

customer_reviews.title: Cute ice packs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in my kids lunch boxes. They are the perfect size and keep things cold till lunch. They've been easy to clean and are durable. The penguin is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and work perfectly. Despite how small they are, they actually stay frozen for a long time. Many times they'd still be cold after school. They are thin so you can tuck them in to tight spaces in the lunch box without filling the whole thing up. I actually stick them in my purse now to use with the baby's food when we are on the run.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: Love these icepacks. They fit right into the lunchbox without taking up any room!! My children's food stays cold all day, it's even partially cold by the time they get home almost 7 hours later!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cold
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son’s lunchbox. They are cute and seem to stay cold. My only complaint is that they are a bit too wide to put two side by side, so I have to flip one upside down to get them to fit, but it’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child's lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's preschool lunch box. He attends school for 3.5 hours, and when I pick him up these coolers are still frozen, perhaps 97% frozen. They are easy to clean, and I have had no issues with leaks. The picture depicts an accurate description of the coolers as well.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Slim, but keeps cold things cold, and penguins!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the penguin shaped ice packs to put in my daughter's school lunches. They are slim enough to fix on top of sandwiches and between a water bottle and small storage containers in the lunchbag. That being said, they do seem to keep her lunch cold even though they are so thin. They work for what I needed and they are bright colors and a fun shape that makes her lunches from home interesting for her.
customer_reviews.author: Katryna Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These are slim and fit nicely into my sons lunch box. They stay cold and he thinks it’s so fun to have the characters instead of just a plain old ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Penguin
customer_reviews.text: The penguin ones are smaller than I thought they’d be. On the plus side, they fit pretty much anywhere. I can tell they’re sturdy and will last long. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lizarraga

customer_reviews.title: Good for lunchboxes
customer_reviews.text: So cute and perfect for a lunchbox! Love the flat shape, makes it easy to slip under food. They work well if the intention is just for a few hours in an insulated lunchbox, but completely unthawed by the end of a school day.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kirk

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: after reading good reviews i thought its good product but after using it i am not happy.its not lasting long and after ice melted it make the bag wet.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Singh

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and cheap. We use these daily for snack bags for school. Really cute and worth the price. Both of my kids like them and keeps their snack cool enough.
customer_reviews.author: lovelylilo

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box ice pack
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my little girls lunch box and they are perfect. They are a nice size and super cute. She is in school for about 6 hrs and when she gets home they are defrosted but still pretty cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my preschooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my preschoolers school lunch. I needed a flat ice pack for my daughter’s bento lunch box bag and this was perfect for it. It’s stays cold but does melt by the time I go pick her up half day.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Cutest things
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the lunch pack. If I need it cooler or just use to my son thinks they are the cutest things. They arrived on time and found it to be a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. I use them for my 5yo daughter's lunch. I'm not sure how long they stay cold, but they are fully defrosted when she comes home from school (7 hours), even though they are inside an insulated lunch bag. A+ for cuteness!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First of all these are precious, who doesnt like penguins? They are a slim design, which is great for lunch boxes...clean really easy, and stay cold for hours. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Galey

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute for my son’s lunch box. Very easy to clean. Stays cold during the school day in an insulated lunch box. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: These ice packs are great! They fit perfect in our lunch boxes and keep the food cold! I Would suggest these to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Jenn K

customer_reviews.title: Make lunch fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daily lunch, my significant other laughed and demanded I use them for his lunches too. They keep sandwiches or sodas cold for about 4.5 hours and are great for daily use. Just plop them in the freezer overnight and you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: LibraryNargle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding these in the stores, until they were delivered, then I found them everywhere. Great product but a bit of a higher price online. Perfect for lunch boxes, kids love them
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Mama

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My kindergarteners lunchbox was so heavy using traditional ice packs, that she struggled with carrying it. These not only make her lunchbox lighter, they leave more room to pack food. She talks about how her friends at school love her owl ice packs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use them in my child's lunch box to keep his sandwich cool. They do melt pretty quickly which is why ...
customer_reviews.text: These are certainly cute and they freeze quickly. I use them in my child's lunch box to keep his sandwich cool. They do melt pretty quickly which is why I didn't give them a higher rating. I don't think they would cool for an extended amount of time. They are pretty thin which is great if you have limited space in a lunchbox, but not great if you want them to stay frozen very long.
customer_reviews.author: Melody byrne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunchbox size and durable
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect fit for my kids lunchboxes and it seems very durable. I can't say about how long the pack stays cold for though.
customer_reviews.author: Zab

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These. Are. Adorable!!!! My daughter loves the penguin ice packs. She is in pre k and i use them for her small lunch bag. Super cute and they work well enough to keep her lunch chilled until she eats it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S Black

customer_reviews.title: YES, Yes and yes
customer_reviews.text: This is a slim product that does the job. I send it to school with my little and it fits perfectly in his PB lunch bag with his Bento Box. Mind you I'm not looking for something to last ALL day just till lunch and the plus is that he loves them as well so they make it home.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good not great.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to slip into kid's lunch boxes as they don't add lots of bulk or weight to the lunch box/bag. Does a reasonable job of keeping things cool. When I pop one into my adult over-sized lunch box, it's not terribly effective, but does manage to keep some items cool.
customer_reviews.author: Grim Rip

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely last and SUPER cute!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for my son's lunch box. They are heavier than the gel filled pouches but these WILL not get punctured like those gel pouches can. I put 2 in the lunch box to make sure things are nice a cool all day. My kiddo really likes the design and colors of the owls.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Thompson

customer_reviews.title: fits great in little lunch boxes
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the space in the lunch box, but this barely takes up any space and keeps the contents nice and cold
customer_reviews.author: Megan Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cold
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping lunch cold. They don’t take a lot of room in lunchbox but work great. Refreeze easily
customer_reviews.author: Doris M. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Thin
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for! I needed a small and thin ice pack for my daughter’s school lunches. She’s in preschool and has a small lunch box. In addition to the cute designs and colors, I love that they’re stackable making it easy to store in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Moon

customer_reviews.title: Cute but thin
customer_reviews.text: Love, love how cute they are. But, since they are thin, they don’t stay cold as long as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: StrawBearie

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold
customer_reviews.text: My kids use these in lunchboxes and they work well and are still cold when they get home from school
customer_reviews.author: johnathan hardin

customer_reviews.title: Bright, happy colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest ice packs. The colors are very bright and pretty. My daughter LOVES them! They are very durable and keep her lunch cold. We also use them as boo-boo ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: JPC

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect for lunch boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and shape of these ice packs. Perfect for lunch boxes. They keep food cold for a day.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: These are very very cute. They do not last ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very very cute. They do not last very long though. Just enough for lunch. Even with all 4. If you plan on having them take left overs home you will need to double up on these. I will say they have been durable though.
customer_reviews.author: M-H

customer_reviews.title: These staty cool a long time
customer_reviews.text: I've been pleasantly surprised by these ice packs. They freeze quickly and stay cold a long time. I use them in my lunchbox for work, and they stay cold a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SEWatHome

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was exactly what I was looking for. I was a little nervous about purchasing after reading the other reviews. But they work great . I purchased these for my 7yr Olds lunch box. I do suggest using two in a lunch box. When they come home in the afternoon, they are semi cold. Her lunch is still cold and fresh for lunch. Thank you for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brussel

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, live the shape and color, small and fit in most lunch bag. The problem is it's filled with water instead of gel, so won't keep cool for long.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Chang

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: They’re good little ice packs. They aren’t very big, which is great for my son’s lunch box. However, since they aren’t big they don’t stay cold for long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving 4 stars because I have to use 2 at a time to keep my kid's snacks cool. They are perfectly thin and don't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Ronisha Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my daughter's lunch box. They fit perfectly under the container. Put two of them in the lunch box and the whole thing is covered. They are really good quality too. No concerns to date and we've been using them for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni B

customer_reviews.title: super cute, very slim
customer_reviews.text: It is great that these do not take up any space in an already cramped lunchbox! Very cute my kids love them

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a little over a month and satisfied. As pictured and functioned as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great for kid's lunchboxes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these cute and functional ice packs! They work great in my daughter's lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: great product bright colors
customer_reviews.text: My kids love taking these in their lunches to school. They are the envy of other kids. Great and easy way to make lunch a little more fun. They are super slim but keep the lunch cool. Absolutely perfect. and beautiful bright colors. Would recommend these to anyone with grade school age kids. In fact I have taken it in my lunch to work before :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, can you say cute or what? And the slimness is absolutely perfect for the smaller lunch totes!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Good for short trips
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fit in small spaces, not an all day ice pack though, maybe 3-4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Neal Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t take up too much room in lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for keeping my kiddos lunch boxes cold throughout the day. They are small, flat and do not take up too much room in the lunchbox. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Kuderka

customer_reviews.title: Thin and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're cute, my 3 year old actually likes to play house with 2 of them at a time. Besides their cuteness, they actually work too and stay cold for an entire day in my kids lunchboxes! I purchased them looking for slimmer, lighter options than the bulky ones we currently and these don't disappoint!

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: These are super fun and super cute they work great for a bento box lunch bag that we use

customer_reviews.title: Cool lunches
customer_reviews.text: These coolers keep lunch bags chilled for hours. Their flat shape do not take up a lot of space in the bags, too.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: So super cute! My kids love these. They are thin and don’t take up a lot of room in the lunch box.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little backpacks
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light weight ice pack so my 3 year old wouldn’t fall over backwards from the weight of his backpack at carpool this year. These are exactly what we needed!

customer_reviews.title: For my toddler TK class
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it and even his classmates like it. He gave it to his friends! I have to buy another set

customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's lunch and she thought it was cute and kept her cheese cold until lunch.

product_meta.title: Fit & Fresh Cool Coolers, Slim Ice Packs for Lunch Boxes, Bags and Coolers, Penguin Shapes for Kids, Set of 4, Multicolored
product_meta.description: Style Name:PenguinsCool Coolers Ice Packs are perfectly sized to fit in all types of lunch bags and boxes. So go ahead and send them off to school with cheese, milk, fruit or veggies knowing that what you pack will stay cool and fresh. With the Cool Coolers Ice Packs, no matter what food you pair with them, it will stay safe and fresh from morning 'til lunch and beyond! Fit & Fresh offers innovative and convenient solutions to make it easier to eat healthier at work, at school and on the go. We make it easier for whole family to eat healthy wherever you go with reusable containers, insulated lunch bags, insulated totes & much more.
feature_bullets: BRIGHTEN UP THEIR DAY: Set of 4 slim reusable ice packs in fun, bright colors
PERFECT SIZE: Slim size designed to use individually to fit into all types of lunch bags and boxes
MATERIALS YOU CAN TRUST: Ice packs are non-toxic, food safe and BPA-free
DIMENSIONS: Each ice pack measures 4.75" x 3.15" x 0.25"
CARE TIPS: Ice packs cannot be placed in the dishwasher or microwave. Hand wash only
